http://tadoc.org/indicator/ADX.htm - Average Directional Movement Index

real = ADX(high, low, close, timeperiod=14)

http://tadoc.org/indicator/ADXR.htm - Average Directional Movement Index Rating

real = ADXR(high, low, close, timeperiod=14)

http://tadoc.org/indicator/APO.htm - Absolute Price Oscillator

real = APO(close, fastperiod=12, slowperiod=26, matype=0)

http://tadoc.org/indicator/AROON.htm - Aroon

aroondown, aroonup = AROON(high, low, timeperiod=14)

http://tadoc.org/indicator/AROONOSC.htm - Aroon Oscillator

real = AROONOSC(high, low, timeperiod=14)

http://tadoc.org/indicator/BOP.htm - Balance Of Power

real = BOP(open, high, low, close)

http://tadoc.org/indicator/CCI.htm - Commodity Channel Index

real = CCI(high, low, close, timeperiod=14)

http://tadoc.org/indicator/CMO.htm - Chande Momentum Oscillator

real = CMO(close, timeperiod=14)

http://tadoc.org/indicator/DX.htm - Directional Movement Index

real = DX(high, low, close, timeperiod=14)

http://tadoc.org/indicator/MACD.htm - Moving Average Convergence/Divergence

macd, macdsignal, macdhist = MACD(close, fastperiod=12, slowperiod=26, signalperiod=9)

http://tadoc.org/indicator/MACDEXT.htm - MACD with controllable MA type

macd, macdsignal, macdhist = MACDEXT(close, fastperiod=12, fastmatype=0, slowperiod=26, slowmatype=0, signalperiod=9, signalmatype=0)

http://tadoc.org/indicator/MACDFIX.htm - Moving Average Convergence/Divergence Fix 12/26

macd, macdsignal, macdhist = MACDFIX(close, signalperiod=9)

http://tadoc.org/indicator/MFI.htm - Money Flow Index

real = MFI(high, low, close, volume, timeperiod=14)

http://tadoc.org/indicator/MINUS_DI.htm - Minus Directional Indicator

real = MINUS_DI(high, low, close, timeperiod=14)

http://tadoc.org/indicator/MINUS_DM.htm - Minus Directional Movement

real = MINUS_DM(high, low, timeperiod=14)

http://tadoc.org/indicator/MOM.htm - Momentum

real = MOM(close, timeperiod=10)

http://tadoc.org/indicator/PLUS_DI.htm - Plus Directional Indicator

real = PLUS_DI(high, low, close, timeperiod=14)

http://tadoc.org/indicator/PLUS_DM.htm - Plus Directional Movement

real = PLUS_DM(high, low, timeperiod=14)

http://tadoc.org/indicator/PPO.htm - Percentage Price Oscillator

real = PPO(close, fastperiod=12, slowperiod=26, matype=0)

http://tadoc.org/indicator/ROC.htm - Rate of change : ((price/prevPrice)-1)*100

real = ROC(close, timeperiod=10)

http://tadoc.org/indicator/ROCP.htm - Rate of change Percentage: (price-prevPrice)/prevPrice

real = ROCP(close, timeperiod=10)

http://tadoc.org/indicator/ROCR.htm - Rate of change ratio: (price/prevPrice)

real = ROCR(close, timeperiod=10)

http://tadoc.org/indicator/ROCR100.htm - Rate of change ratio 100 scale: (price/prevPrice)*100

real = ROCR100(close, timeperiod=10)

http://tadoc.org/indicator/RSI.htm - Relative Strength Index

real = RSI(close, timeperiod=14)

http://tadoc.org/indicator/STOCH.htm - Stochastic

slowk, slowd = STOCH(high, low, close, fastk_period=5, slowk_period=3, slowk_matype=0, slowd_period=3, slowd_matype=0)

http://tadoc.org/indicator/STOCHF.htm - Stochastic Fast

fastk, fastd = STOCHF(high, low, close, fastk_period=5, fastd_period=3, fastd_matype=0)

http://tadoc.org/indicator/STOCHRSI.htm - Stochastic Relative Strength Index

fastk, fastd = STOCHRSI(close, timeperiod=14, fastk_period=5, fastd_period=3, fastd_matype=0)

http://tadoc.org/indicator/TRIX.htm - 1-day Rate-Of-Change (ROC) of a Triple Smooth EMA

real = TRIX(close, timeperiod=30)

http://tadoc.org/indicator/ULTOSC.htm - Ultimate Oscillator

real = ULTOSC(high, low, close, timeperiod1=7, timeperiod2=14, timeperiod3=28)

http://tadoc.org/indicator/WILLR.htm - Williams' %R

real = WILLR(high, low, close, timeperiod=14)
